name: CHEESE INVADE!
description:
INVASION OF CHEESE ALIEN

Controls:

Left/right arrowOrbit around the planetZ Pewpew (only 2 at a time)RQuick ResetSpace barBegin Game (only works at menu screen)

Info: 

A short arcade game where you shoot at cheese meteors to prevent them from landing on the planet and ruining everything.

Your Mission:

Save the earth from the cheese spheres, and eliminate the cheese alien so that he stops throwing cheese and leaves our planet alone already please Mr. Cheese Alien stop with the cheese we don't want to taste your cheese stop right now.

Details:

Meteors will try to approach the planet. You must shoot them to stop them from destroying it. If a meteor touches the planet you lose a life, and if you lose all lives it's GAME OVER (oh no!). Spin around the planet and aim your shots carefully. Always be on the watch, for the cheese meteors only come more quickly as time goes by. Eventually, the CHEESE ALIEN will appear and start to annoy you, and you must hit him to defeat the cheese menace and SAVE THE WORLD FOREVER... Then the next round starts and you do it all over again. Fun!
